rules.6x6: Place a digit from 1 to 6 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 2x3 outlined box. In each 3x3 outlined box, all shaded cells must contain digits of the same parity.
rules.9x9: Place a digit from 1 to 9 into each empty cell in the grid so that each digit appears exactly once in each row, column and 3x3 outlined box. In each 3x3 outlined box, all shaded cells must contain digits of the same parity.
